footer_description: The marketplace for buying and selling secondhand fashion.
join_and_sell: Join and sell pre-loved clothes with no fees
password_min_length: Password must be at least 7 characters
reset_email_sent: If this email address is registered with Souq, then we sent your password reset instructions there.

buyer_protection_info: Our Buyer Protection fee is mandatory when you purchase an item on Vinted. It is added to every purchase made with the “Buy Now” button. The item price is set by the seller and may be subject to negotiation.
username_change_note: If you change your username, you won’t be able to modify it again for 30 days.

about_placeholder: Tell us more about yourself and your style

delete_info: If you delete your account, it will be deactivated immediately. Deactivated accounts are only visible to Team Vinted before they are permanently deleted. The deletion takes place within the time frames indicated in Vinted’s Privacy Policy.
phone_usage_note: Your phone number will only be used to help you log in. It won’t be public or used for marketing.
shipping_info: Choose which options you’d like to use for each shipping type.
from_address_note: A courier collects the order from you.
no_options: Currently, there are no options that ship from your address.
dropoff_note: You take the order to a location like a locker or package shop.
shipping_disabling: Disabling shipping options may reduce sales. If a member can only buy from you with a disabled option, we may still offer it.
note_bottom: Some shipping options are enabled for all sellers on our platform and can’t be turned off.
cardInfoSecure: Your card information is securely encrypted

featureInMarketingDesc: This allows Vinted to showcase my items on social media and other websites. The increased visibility could lead to quicker sales.
notifyFavorites: Notify owners when I favorite their items
personalizedFeed: Allow Vinted to personalize my feed and search results by evaluating my preferences, settings, previous purchases and usage of Vinted website and app
showRecentlyViewed: Allow Vinted to display my recently viewed items on my Homepage.
showRecentlyViewedDesc: If you turn this option off but allow personalized content, these items will still be used to personalize your Feed.
downloadDataDesc: Request a copy of your Vinted account data.
heading: Keep your account secure

Standard Payment Completed

escrowProcessing: Your payment is being processed and will be securely held in escrow once completed. You will be notified when the payment is confirmed and the seller can ship your order.
escrowHeldUntilDelivery: Your payment is securely held in escrow until you confirm delivery of the item. The seller will be notified to ship your order.
paymentProcessingNotice: Your payment is being processed. You will be notified once the payment is confirmed and the seller can ship your order.
paymentProcessedSellerNotified: Your payment has been processed successfully. The seller will be notified to ship your order. You will receive tracking information once the item is shipped.

confirmMarkReservedNote: This will indicate the product is temporarily unavailable.
confirmMarkUnsold: Are you sure you want to mark this product as unsold?

confirmMakeAvailable: Are you sure you want to make this product available again?
confirmMakeAvailableNote: This will make the product visible in search results and allow new offers.
confirmProceed: Are you sure you want to proceed?
privacy_intro_text: At SOUQ, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our platform.
information_collect_text: We may collect the following types of information when you use our services:
personal_info_item: Personal details such as name, email, phone number, and address
usage_info_item: Information about how you use our platform, including browsing and purchase history
device_info_item: Device and technical information such as IP address, browser type, and operating system
use_information_text: We use the information we collect for purposes such as:
provide_services_item: To provide and operate our services
improve_services_item: To improve, personalize, and optimize our platform
communicate_item: To communicate with you regarding your account, purchases, and support
security_item: To maintain safety, detect fraud, and ensure security
sharing_information_text: We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information with trusted partners, service providers, or when required by law to comply with legal obligations.
your_rights_text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You may also request restrictions on how we use your data in accordance with applicable laws.
privacy_contact_text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how your information is handled, please contact our support team through the Help Center or email us at support@souq.com.
press_description: Find the latest news, media resources, and official updates about SOUQ. Explore press releases, announcements, and stories about our marketplace.

hero.title: SOUQ is your platform for
hero.subtitle: One community, thousands of brands, and a whole lot of second-hand style. Ready to get started? Here’s how it works.

step1.title: 1. List for free
step1.desc: Take photos of your item, add a description, set your price, and upload.

step2.title: 2. Sell it, ship it
step2.desc: Sold! Print your prepaid shipping label and drop off the parcel within 5 days.

step3.title: 3. It’s payday!
step3.desc: No selling fees — what you earn is yours. Payment is released once the buyer confirms.

step1.title: 1. Find it
step1.desc: Browse millions of unique items and brands. Save your favorites.

step2.title: 2. Buy it
step2.desc: Chat with the seller if needed, then pay securely via card, Apple Pay, Google Pay or SOUQ Wallet.

step3.title: 3. Get it
step3.desc: See estimated delivery at checkout. You’ll be notified when it’s shipped.

item1.title: Shop with peace of mind
item1.desc: Each purchase includes Buyer Protection, keeping your money and info safe.

item2.title: Reliable refund policy
item2.desc: If your order doesn’t arrive, is damaged, or not as described, request a refund within 2 days.
